deck.theme: Energy juggling and rapid ascension gates

cards.title: Spark Initiate
cards.lore: A flicker that awakens the forge.

cards.title: Voltage Strike
cards.effect: Deal 2 damage. If you spent Energy this turn, deal +1.
cards.lore: Lightning tuned to a duelist's rhythm.

cards.title: Gate Pulse
cards.effect: If you opened a Gate this turn, gain 2 Spark Points. Otherwise, gain 1 Energy.
cards.lore: Each gate echoes across the realms.

cards.title: Realm Beacon
cards.effect: While active, your Support cards cost 1 less (min 0).
cards.lore: A pillar of light guiding initiates upward.

cards.title: Ascender's Focus
cards.effect: Convert 1 Energy into 1 Spark Point (once per turn).
cards.lore: Focus turns charge into pure ascent.

cards.title: Parallel Shield
cards.effect: Prevent the next 2 damage dealt to you this round.
cards.lore: Two timelines hold the blow together.

rules.setup: Shuffle the deck. Give each player 3 cards and 1 Energy token.
turn: Play up to 1 card by paying its cost in Energy.
Resolve effects and check if a Gate opens (3 Energy spent this turn).
Opening a Gate grants +1 permanent Energy and lets you play one extra card next turn.
rules.scoring: Spark Points are tracked with tokens; first to 7 wins.
